resources.string: Ouch! Funny thing just happened! Let's start again.
Ending the current A2A session. If you want to disconnect from network too, Click "Disconnect". Otherwise, Click "End Session" to end the current session only.
Your friend has ended the game. If you want to disconnect, Click "Disconnect". Otherwise, Click "End Session" to end the current session only.
Your friend has lost connection. If you want to disconnect, Click "Disconnect". Otherwise, Click "End Session" to end the current session only.
\s cannot take the pressure of your awesome skill and lose it.
\s is clicked!\nPlay-Start playing.\nRequest-Request a different option.
\s is requesting for a different game option to play.
This will cancel the current game. Ok?
The Game has stopped because your friend only has lite version of the game.
This is a lite version of the game and cannot play further. Please buy the full version to enjoy the game unrestrictive.
